channel.title: Interdisciplinarity on Marta Kołczyńska
channel.description: Recent content in Interdisciplinarity on Marta Kołczyńska

item.title: So you want to harmonize data?
item.description: So You Want to Write a Fugue? Glenn Gould So you want to write a fugue? You’ve got the urge to write a fugue You’ve got the nerve to write a fugue So go ahead and write a fugue that we can sing Pay no heed to what we’ve told you Give no mind to what we’ve told you Just forget all that we’ve told you And the theory that you’ve read
